channel.title: Item view adjusting
channel.description:
Since I am trying to make a private server that is perfect I always have to make every little thing as good as it can be, and most of the time if I just tinker with it I can fix it easly, but with this I have no clue. I recently added Dagon'hai robes but the in backpack view of them is all messed up, it doesn't show the sizes quite right at all. If anyone could help me out it would just be great, im working alot today so ill mostly be on alot.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/208isnp.jpg[/img]

item.title: Item view adjusting
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Deathschaos9 I love you for live buddy, I added in so many customs that I want to fix up and make the views better and now I can!! Thank you, If i could rep I would!!

Read full topic

item.title: Item view adjusting
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

lol you agin it works the other way to but alot alot alot easyer your way so =P

Read full topic

item.title: Item view adjusting
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Actually he has to mess with model rotation and model zoom/offset in the class8 ints.

class8.anInt181 = ; // zoom; increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = ; // model rotate; up+down increase to move down away from you class8.anInt198 = ; // model rotate; side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = ; // model offset; increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = ; // model offset; increase to move up

Read full topic
